info.description: The Active Worker Download connector enables buyers, suppliers, and MSP partner administrators to download worker data on currently active workers in SAP Fieldglass.
info.title: Active Worker Download

hostname.description: The SAP Fieldglass region where the SAP Fieldglass APIs are used.

x-sap-shortText: Download Active Workers from SAP Fieldglass.

OAuth2.description: To use this REST API, you need to get OAuth client credentials (user credentials and client-specific application key) from an SAP Fieldglass account representative. After that, you need to pass the obtained client credentials to the SAP Fieldglass token endpoint to obtain an access token.

get.summary: The Active Worker Download connector enables buyers, suppliers, and MSP partner administrators to download worker data on currently active workers in SAP Fieldglass.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Only required for production access when using SAP Fieldglass.

parameters.name: X-ApplicationKey
parameters.description: The company-specific key provided by SAP Fieldglass for API access. Required for production access.

[c]Worker Custom Fields.description:
Custom fields found on the worker.
If there are many custom fields, there will be many
columns.Column header format will be: 
"[c]modulename_custom field name" (i.e. [c] followed by
module custom text lowercase with no spaces, followed by
underscore, followed by the custom field name text as
defined by users in the SAP Fieldglass application.)

Job Seeker ID.description: 14-character alphanumeric SAP Fieldglass Job Seeker ID.

[c]Buyer or Supplier custom fields.description:
Custom fields found on the supplier. (For supplier side
download, only those fields required by buyer for supplier
to be entered and viewed are downloaded.)If there are many
custom fields, there will be many columns.Column header
format will be: 
?[c]modulename_custom field name? (i.e. [c] followed by
module custom text lowercase with no spaces, followed by
underscore, followed by the custom field name text as
defined by users in the SAP Fieldglass application.)

First Name.description: First name of the Worker as defined in SAP Fieldglass.

Remit To address Code.description: Code as assigned to the Remit To Address by supplier.

Cost Center Name.description: Cost Center Name in SAP Fieldglass.

Bill Rate.description:
Worker?s Bill Rate that is associated to the Rate
Category/UOM listed in the previous field.

Security ID.description:
This column will only appear in the file if the security ID
field functionality is activated in SAP Fieldglass for the
buyer. If the functionality is not activated, this column
will not be in the file.

[c]Work Order Custom Fields.description:
Custom fields found on the work order/work order revision. 
If there are many custom fields, there will be many columns.
Column header format will be:
?[c]modulename_custom field name? (i.e. [c] followed by
module custom text lowercase with no spaces, followed by
underscore, followed by the custom field name text as
defined by users in the SAP Fieldglass application.)

Job Posting Title.description: Job Posting?s Title or SOW Name for SOW Workers.

Pay Rate.description:
Worker?s Pay Rate that is associated to the Rate Category/UOM
listed in the previous field. 
If Supplier did not enter a Pay Rate, 0.00 will be
displayed.

Vendor Number.description: SAP Fieldglass Supplier code for buyer.

Person ID.description: Unique identifier for the worker as a person.

Cost Center Code.description: Cost Center Code in SAP Fieldglass.

[c]Worker User Person Custom Fields.description:
Custom fields found on the worker user person
If there are many custom fields, there will be many columns.
Column header format will be: 
?[c]modulename_custom field name? (i.e. [c] followed by
module custom text lowercase with no spaces, followed by
underscore, followed by the custom field name text as
defined by users in the SAP Fieldglass application.)

Rate Category /UOM.description:
Worker?s Rate Category/Unit Of Measure for which the
corresponding rate will be displayed. 
More than one Rate Category/UOM may exist for a single
Worker. If this is the case a new line will appear for each
associated Rate Category/UOM in this file.

Segmented Object Detail.description:
Segmented Object Detail string. Segments will be separated by
delimiter on the Segmented Object.
Valid delimiters are colon (:), semi-colon (;), pipe (|), and
dash (-).
Required if ?Enable Segmented Object Detail? configuration is
set.
This field is mutually exclusive with GL Account fields.
More than one string can appear for a cost center.

Last Name.description: Last name of the Worker as defined in SAP Fieldglass.
